Title: Thieving Raiders
Description:
Saurok!

These vile creatures are obsessed with killing and stealing. They attacked our settlement without provocation or warning.

Please, $c, can you aid us?

Help us recover our lost possessions from these Riverblade raiders that march along the river and we will gladly reward you.
ObjectivesText: Recover 5 pieces of Pillaged Jinyu Loot.
CompletionText: I think they even stole my holy spittoon.
RewardText:
Not many would stop to help a village in need... especially so deep in the wilds.

You are a champion to our people, $p.
